original_text:
for he is our God
    and we are the people of his pasture,
    the flock under his care.
Today, if only you would hear his voice,
korean_text: 그는 우리의 하나님이시요 우리는 그가 기르시는 백성이며 그의 손이 돌보시는 양이기 때문이라 너희가 오늘 그의 음성을 듣거든

sentences.original_text: and we are the people of his pasture
Today, if only you would hear his voice
sentences.korean_translation: 오늘, 너희가 오직 그의 음성을 들었더라면
